# UIFont.TextStyle

**Structure**

Constants that describe the preferred styles for fonts.

## Declaration

```swift
struct TextStyle
```

## Overview

Pass these constants to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFont/preferredFont(forTextStyle:)] method of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFont] or the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFontDescriptor/preferredFontDescriptor(withTextStyle:)] method of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFontDescriptor] to retrieve the corresponding font information.

## Constants

- **body**: The font for body text.
- **callout**: The font for callouts.
- **caption1**: The font for standard captions.
- **caption2**: The font for alternate captions.
- **footnote**: The font for footnotes.
- **headline**: The font for headings.
- **subheadline**: The font for subheadings.
- **largeTitle**: The font style for large titles.
- **extraLargeTitle**: The font style for extra large titles.
- **extraLargeTitle2**: The font style for extra extra large titles.
- **title1**: The font for first-level hierarchical headings.
- **title2**: The font for second-level hierarchical headings.
- **title3**: The font for third-level hierarchical headings.

## Metrics

- **metrics**: The corresponding font metrics object for the text style.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a text style with the specified raw value.

## Creating Fonts

- **Scaling Fonts Automatically**: Scale text in your interface automatically using Dynamic Type.
- **Creating self-sizing table view cells**: Create table view cells that support Dynamic Type and use system spacing constraints to adjust the spacing surrounding text labels.
- **preferredFont(forTextStyle:)**: Returns an instance of the system font for the specified text style with scaling for the user’s selected content size category.
- **preferredFont(forTextStyle:compatibleWith:)**: Returns an instance of the system font for the appropriate text style and traits.
- **init(name:size:)**: Creates and returns a font object for the specified font name and size.
- **init(descriptor:size:)**: Returns a font that matches the specified font descriptor.
- **withSize(_:)**: Returns a font object that is the same as the font, but has the specified size.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
